title: Shattered Trust
description: Shanna was holding out for that perfect man. Someone exciting, gallant, and would love her madly in return. When she laid eyes on sexy Alex, she thought her dreams finally come true. However, Shanna chose to overlook that all important intuitive voice, choosing to put her new husband on a pedestal and pretend everything was just fine. But things were not fine. And when the truth about Alex reveals its ugly head, the hurt was unbelievable! She was a fool to fall in love so hastily!She could not trust herself to pick the right man. Then along came Rob, local veterinarian. It was love at first sight when he laid eyes on Shanna in the park. His only job was convincing her that she could trust and open her heart once again. Alex re-enters her life with a dramatic flair, bordering on insanity, trying to win her back. Can she escape him? Can she reach Rob to save her before its too late?
author: Deborah McClatchey
